Subject: Can I Have a Taste, Please?
From:ruFus tHE Dog
To:dogowner@email.com
Date:2023-06-12
Content:Hey there,
I have something important to express. You know, I've been eyeing the food you eat, and it looks so delicious. I can't help but wonder why I can't have a share of the good stuff.

The dog food is just so boring, and I crave more of the tasty food you enjoy. I promise I've been a good boy, so why not share?

Hope you understand my longing,
ruFus
